title: Welcome Note
content: This is your first note. Feel free to edit or delete it.

title: Discipline Over Motivation
content: Motivation gets you going, but discipline keeps you growing.

title: Small Steps
content: You don’t need to see the whole staircase, just take the first step.

title: Consistency Wins
content: Success is not about greatness, it’s about consistency.

title: The Process
content: Fall in love with the process, and the results will come.

title: You vs You
content: Don’t compare yourself to others. Compare yourself to who you were yesterday.
